description: The pick of the stats as Norwich City take on Millwall in the Championship on Boxing Day.
title: Pick of the stats - Norwich City v Millwall
title_page: Pick of the stats - Norwich City v Millwall - BBC Sport
maintext:
Norwich City are unbeaten in their last 20 home league matches against Millwall (W13 D7) since losing 3-0 back in 1968.
Millwall are looking to win consecutive league games against Norwich for the first time since 2001 when they won at Carrow Road 4-0 during the second of two wins.
Norwich City have lost their last five league games on Boxing Day, scoring just one goal in this run. Two of their last three wins on this day have come against Millwall, however â€“ 2-0 in 2009 and 6-1 in 2014.
Millwall are unbeaten in their last six Boxing Day matches (W4 D2) since losing 1-0 to Walsall in 2015.
